biography.summary: Roger F. Wicker is a Republican U.S. Senator from Mississippi who has served in the Senate since 2007. He previously represented Mississippi's 1st congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1995 to 2007. Wicker has been involved in issues including defense, agriculture, and commerce, and has held leadership roles within the Republican caucus.

contact.office_address: 425 Russell Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510
